recipes.title: Veggie Carbonara
recipes.desc: A delicious vegetarian twist on the classic carbonara with creamy sauce and fresh vegetables.

recipes.title: Vegan Tacos
recipes.desc: Tasty and healthy vegan tacos filled with black beans, corn, and a variety of fresh toppings.

recipes.title: Quinoa Salad
recipes.desc: A refreshing and nutritious quinoa salad with cherry tomatoes, cucumbers, and a lemon vinaigrette.

recipes.title: Chicken Alfredo
recipes.desc: Creamy and rich chicken alfredo pasta that is perfect for a hearty dinner.

recipes.title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
recipes.desc: Bell peppers stuffed with a flavorful mixture of rice, beans, and spices, topped with melted cheese.
